## IChartComponent.resize() method

By default resize is performed on every draw, this can be disabled and controlled manually.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resize(): ICanvasDimensions;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[ICanvasDimensions](./core.icanvasdimensions.md)
